description:
Have you ever looked at an electronic device and wondered how it worked? Welcome to this course on electronic fundamentals. This course will give you a foundational understanding on how electronics work. This course is created for the developer, designer, inventor or really anyone who wants to know how electronics work.

This introductory course on electronics will cover basic theory, a brief history, DC and AC electrical circuits. We will also go into electronic components, circuit design, and circuit construction methods.

Towards the end of the course we will do some demonstrations of real world electronic circuits, then we will get into prototyping and circuit building techniques.
title: Intro to Electronics: Explore The World of Electronics
